text: tirccayayum nam a visvasta detyam (uttaravadittam) akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum parvvatannaluteyum mumpake etuttukattukayuntayi. ennal at erretukkunnatin ava visam'matikkukayum atinepparri avaykk peti teannukayum ceytu. manusyan at erretuttu. tirccayayum avan katutta akramiyum avivekiyumayirikkunnu
